transcripts: Is your coffee maker equipped to please a crowd? Can it satisfy different tastes at the same time? Is it missing that extra plus? The fully automatic Cuisinart Coffee Plus has two separate heating systems with two generous reservoirs to brew 12 cups of fresh hot coffee. Plus, a 56 ounce hot water system to dispense more beverages at the same time or on its own. So you can keep the hot beverages flowing and the day going. It's not just a coffee maker. It's definitely a Plus. Cuisinart Coffee Plus.
